xml.data:
Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 2 Kusalattika » 2.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Kusalattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
391.
1158Kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
1159Kusalo dhammo akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
1160Kusalo dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo…  pacchājātapaccayena paccayo…  kammapaccayena paccayo.
1161Kusalo dhammo kusalassa ca abyākatassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo. (4)
392.
1162Akusalo dhammo akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
1163Akusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
1164Akusalo dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo…  pacchājātapaccayena paccayo…  kammapaccayena paccayo.
1165Akusalo dhammo akusalassa ca abyākatassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo. (4)
393.
1166Abyākato dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo…  purejātapaccayena paccayo…  pacchājātapaccayena paccayo…  āhārapaccayena paccayo…  indriyapaccayena paccayo.
1167Abyākato dhammo kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo…  purejātapaccayena paccayo.
1168Abyākato dhammo akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo…  purejātapaccayena paccayo. (3)
394.
1169Kusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā kusalassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ.
1170Kusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā abyākatassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. (2)
395.
1171Akusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā akusalassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ.
1172Akusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā abyākatassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. (2)
1173Pañhāvārassa paccanīyuddhāraṃ.
